name: Dream Well (Vicimus)
description:
Journey through an atmospheric dreamscape and avoid your worst nightmares in Dream Well, a new narrative arcade horror game from indie studio Vicimus. What will you do when dreams become nightmares?

  • Learning AI that hunt you down
  • Responsive Environment
  • Procedural Music Generation
  • Incremental Difficulty
  • Growing Narrative
  • STEALTH
  • 1 - 2 hour Gameplay
  • Platform: PC/MAC/LINUX
  • Controls: Keyboard and Mouse
  • Language: English

Dream Well is brought to you by Vicimus--an indie game development studio known for their prior games Down Under and Woven Shadows. Vicimus will release 4 chapters of their new game Dream Well, each including a new nightmare. Once a new chapter is created, players will be able to update to the newest chapter and the final release of the game. Each of these updates will be free to players who purchase the currently released chapter.

Remember to follow us on the social medias, keep up with us through Discord, and support us on Patreon! Vicimus is made possible entirely through your support – thank you to all of our players, fans, and backers! We could do it without you, but it would suck. A lot.

Follow us for live updates: https://twitter.com/vicimus_
